role.description: Role name that must exactly match a role defined in accessControl.roles[].name. This is a strict reference - the role must exist in the accessControl configuration. Note: Cross-reference validation requires external tooling.

permission.description: Permission name that must exactly match a permission defined in accessControl.permissions[]. If permissions are only defined within roles (accessControl.roles[].permissions[]), those can also be referenced. This is a strict reference - the permission must exist in the accessControl configuration. Note: Cross-reference validation requires external tooling.

prompt.description: Custom authorization logic prompt that must be satisfied. Used for dynamic access control that cannot be expressed as static roles or permissions.
